message.text:
Hi all, Our build pipelines are failing for the url: <https://artifacts.sitecore.com/public/resources/nuget>. We are using the Sitecore Nuget Public feeds, <https://nuget.sitecore.com/resources/v3/index.json>. Anyone else facing this issue or knows a resolution for this one?

This is the error message we are getting:
```The request was aborted: Could not create SSL/TLS secure channel.
##[error]The nuget command failed with exit code(1) and error(Failed to retrieve information about 'Newtonsoft.Json' from remote source '<https://artifacts.sitecore.com/public/resources/nuget/newtonsoft.json/index.json>'.```
